channel.title: Armour Colors
channel.description: Hi im wanting to know if there is a way to make my armour colors lighter like for my fighter torso its really darks and im wanting to make it brighter like a bright grey would that be possible?

item.title: Armour Colors
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

you would have to add a new model. Its not just like a paint file. You would have to find a model with the color you want, add it , its ints, and it ingame

Read full topic
